name: electrician
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a person who puts in, checks, and repairs electrical wires and electrical equipment
Examples
The electrician has diagnosed a fault in the wiring.You'd better get a qualified electrician to sort this out - you don't some amateur messing around with your electrics.

a person who puts in and checks electrical wires etc.: a certified/licensed/qualified electrician For the past year, he has worked as an electrician at a plant in Manchester.
